column2: "Ah, such bother, such bother! 'Tis beyond reason! Curse those troublesome children."
"...Oh? Halt, <%me>! 'Tis serendipitous! Lend an ear for one's grumbles!"
"1. Declined"
"2. Is something on your mind?"
"Here, here. Do not be distant. Thy shouldst listen to thy friends."
"Umu, umu. That is indeed the case. Do pay heed."
"As told by tales, Harukotan is of an indivisible disposition. With death, comes rebirth."
"As one exists in life, so shall one exist in death."
"Indeed, here on this planet, a daemon known as the [Magatsu] is sealed in death, in opposition of one."
"With that said, the seal is verily strong. In current conditions, the daemon shall slumber for tens of centuries to come. However..."
"...Those troublesome children hast been meddlesome, tampering with the seals."
"Thanks to that, Rituals wilt be performed, seals erected. One's resting hours hast diminished!"
"Trouble trouble, aah, 'tis troublesome! And so, doth thou fathom one's irritation?"
"Sigh... 'Tis truly refreshing. A friend is certainly fine to have, for being able to speak without restraint."
"However, <%me>, vigilance must be had with the troublesome children."
"One is poorly versed in the tales of the children, and couldst not comprehend them. Regardless, one knows the danger they pose."
"If they art the reason thou came to this planet, this may be a troublesome distraction."
"Nevertheless, keep this advice from a friend in thine heart."
"More importantly, one senses the signs of disturbance stirring once more."
"The Shironians are far from dependable. One's apologies, but thou may hast to lessen thine hopes."
